tool_description: Various image utilities like get palette and blurhash
name: Image Service
title: Image Service

api_list.name: profile-image
api_list.description: Generate profile image from users initials
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://image-service1.p.rapidapi.com/api/profile-images/john-example"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "image-service1.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://image-service1.p.rapidapi.com/api/profile-images/{name}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "image-service1.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
